column4: anyone have any luck installing server 11.04 off the release ISO?
i managed to get to installing base system then it asked for the cd labeled Ubuntu-Server 11.04 _Natty Narwhal_ - Release amd64
where my cd is labeled Ubuntu-Server 11.04 "Natty Narwhal" - Release amd64
can you disable the cd as a source and do everything from online?
